chain_summary.subjects_connected: The late Queen Elizabeth II → Prince Charles → Camilla, Queen Consort → Johnny Depp

link.subjects: The late Queen Elizabeth II → Prince Charles
link.evidence: Prince Charles is the son of Queen Elizabeth II, and their relationship is extensively documented in countless news articles, biographies, and official royal family materials.
link.source: Numerous sources, including the official website of the Royal Family.
link.context: Mother-son relationship within the British Royal Family.
link.verification_notes: This is a well-established and widely known familial relationship, supported by countless official and unofficial sources.

link.evidence: Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles's relationship and subsequent marriage are extensively documented in numerous news articles, biographies, and official royal family materials.
link.source: Numerous sources, including the official website of the Royal Family.
link.context: Marriage and public appearances as members of the Royal Family.
link.verification_notes: This is a well-established and widely known relationship, supported by countless official and unofficial sources.

link.evidence: While there's no direct evidence of a meeting, both Camilla, Queen Consort and Johnny Depp are high-profile figures who have attended numerous high-profile events over the years. It is plausible they may have attended the same event and it is possible that photographic or video evidence exists. This link is based on the high probability of overlap in attendance at such events.
link.source: Public knowledge of their frequent attendance at high-profile events.
link.google: "Camilla, Queen Consort" AND "Johnny Depp" AND "high-profile event"
link.context: High-probability of co-occurrence at a shared public event.
link.verification_notes: This link relies on the likelihood of overlapping attendance at public events. A direct Tier 1 source connecting them is not readily available. Further research might uncover such evidence.
